children.text: Great Commission Church goes beyond our Sunday Services. The church recognises the importance of forming healthy relationships with one another. Connect Groups offer you the opportunity to meet with others, in a relaxed homely environment, enabling you to form friendships for times of fellowship and personal support. These groups facilitate Biblical teaching, worship and prayer in a secure and welcoming atmosphere. There are many Connect Groups in various locations throughout Essex and London.

We’re so glad you’ve shown an interest in getting plugged into our community. This is the first step in being placed in a physical group and will give you a chance to meet new people as well as the opportunity to be known by our leaders.

First we’d love to place you within an open online connect group. This is the first step in being placed in a physical group and will give you a chance to meet new people as well as the opportunity to be known by our leaders. You’ll spend time studying the Bible and praying with other people too. After a period of time you will then be placed into a physical connect group in a location near to you.
